thread.section_title: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: New hotel
thread.title_full: New hotel - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Mike W
title: New hotel
text: Stayed at the Homewood Suites SFO North before an early morning flight from SFO. Hotel is new, and very large. On the night of my stay, it was also very crowded. the room was nice and clean, the bed very comfortable. The evening social and breakfast were both well stock and the food was good. The dining area is a bit small for the size of the hotel, and can get a little crowded. All in all a nice stay.
